duties_responsibilities.duty: Full accountability of developing and delivering the electric vehicle architecture strategy including price trends of emerging technologies.
Assessing the landscape around motors, controllers, lithium batteries, transaxles, harnesses, chargers and developing a roadmap for portfolio needs.
Developing and maintaining a vehicle and component electrical specification and qualification plan.
Optimizing the electrical components portfolio through technical, supply chain, and cost analysis for the entire electric vehicle portfolio.
Driving diligence and collaboration in requirements, risk analysis, DFMEA, DVP&R, and specifications.
AC induction and permanent magnet motors including design, manufacturing, and validation.
Battery chargers including design, manufacturing, and validation.
Harness and power distribution including design, manufacturing, and validation.
Translating voice of customer into vehicle level specifications that align with the electrical vehicle architecture roadmap.
Partnering with top employers to find high-quality talent and evaluating and representing the best candidates in the marketplace.
Providing updates and feedback to candidates at each stage of the hiring process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
